title: "Savannah for Morons" Comedy Trolley Tour
description:
Join Old Town Trolley Tour's newest comedy tour – “Savannah for Morons”, a comedy show on wheels that roasts nearly 300 years of Savannah lore in 90 fun-filled minutes. A quirky, saucy and eccentric history lesson, perfect for morons and their (supposedly) smarter-ish friends, this tour features outrageously entertaining comedy skits, musical numbers, costume changes, a few absurd appearances, and loads of Savannah history.

Hosted by the infamous Moron Twins, Dannie and Danny Moron, this frolic around Savannah will give you all the inside gossip on practically every important moment that has transpired throughout Savannah’s deep, complex, and intoxicating (and intoxicated) past and present; from the founding of the colony of Georgia to the Civil War; from little known Paula Deen trivia to why every tourist must take a selfie on the Forrest Gump bench. 

*Please Note: This tour is NOT recommended for children under the age of 13.
... More

title: The Mountebank Comedy Walk of Edinburgh
description: Comedy club meets history class on this walking tour with a professional comedian. Explore Old Town Edinburgh’s highlights and ask anything you want to know about Scotland. Your guide is a local, professional, stand-up comedian guaranteed to make you laugh yourself silly!... More

title: Mike Hammer Comedy Magic Show
description: Experience the comedy and magic of Mike Hammer at the Four Queens Resort and Casino in Las Vegas. Hammer takes audience interaction to the limit (no one is safe), blending cutting-edge wit with stunning magic. Anything can and frequently does happen. From swallowing razorblades to reading minds, the show builds in complexity, culminating in the ‘Pick Pocket Booth of Solitude,’ a masterful combination of all the things Hammer does so well. Choose between general or VIP seating for this fast-paced, 70-minute performance.... More

title: Hoover Dam Comedy Tour with Lunch and Comedy Club Tickets
description: Combine comedy with sightseeing on this unique tour of the Hoover Dam from Las Vegas with a professional comedian as your guide. Stop at the Welcome to Las Vegas Sign for photos without having to wait in line. Visit the Hoover Dam Museum, then enjoy an exclusive “Walk on Top” guided tour of the Hoover Dam with comedic entertainment. Also includes access to the interior of the dam and lunch at a restaurant.... More

title: Magic & Comedy Show Starring Michael Bairefoot
description: Families and groups will enjoy this fun-for-all-ages magic and comedy show in Myrtle Beach. Buying your tickets ahead of time guarantees your admission and eliminates the disappointment of sold-out days or times. Parking is included in ticket price for extra convenience.... More

title: Stand Up Comedy LIVE in Times Square At Broadway Comedy Club
description: Bring some fun to a night out by catching up-and-coming stand-ups in action at this intimate comedy club in midtown Manhattan. Line-ups typically include several comics, with previous performers having featured on the likes of Comedy Central, HBO, and MTV. Table service means you can order drinks (two-drink minimum) without missing any of the on-stage action.... More

title: Steve Falcon's Comedy Hypnosis Hour
description: Watch the hilarious Steve Falcon use his hypnosis skills to put on a rousing show right in the heart of Myrtle Beach. Head to the Charles Bach Wonders Theatre and enjoy a hysterical show featuring comedy, sound effects, top production value, and, of course, hypnosis. No two shows are the same!... More

title: The Comedy Walk
description: Get a breath of fresh air among Bath’s Georgian terraces and Roman heritage on this comedy walking tour that mixes street theater, humor, and stunts to create an experience that’s got something for every age. You’ll see plenty of the city but the focus is on the hysterical, not the historical, for a very alternative evening.... More

title: LOL Comedy Lounge in Times Square
description: Plan for an evening filled with laughs at the LOL Times Square Comedy Club, located in the heart of New York, with this skip-the-line ticket. This club features up-and-coming acts, seasoned local talent, and comic headliners. A full bar is available; there is a two-drink minimum (alcoholic or non-alcoholic) per person per show.... More

title: Competitive Comedy @ Neighborhood Comedy Theatre
description: Audience participation is a must as you join some of Phoenix’s most hilarious comedians. Book your tickets to this interactive, 90-minute comedy show at the famous National Comedy Theater. Based on the hit “Whose Line is it Anyway”, you’re challenged to offer suggestions and shout out ideas – when you’re not laughing too hard to speak.... More

title: Wacky Chad Stunt Comedy Show
description:
Extreme Pogo Sticking! 

WackyChad! one-man interactive stunt comedy show serves up a delightful entertainment experience. Hilarious, action-packed, and physically mesmerizing, WackyChad!’s charmingly funny jokes and wild antics will leave you roaring with laughter and applause in amazement. WackyChad! is his own witty master of ceremonies, improvising as he banters with the audience. Laugh along as WackyChad! fills the stage with big tricks and huge laughs!

... More

title: Improv Comedy at Boom Chicago
description:
Get ready for big laughs at Boom Chicago, the Amsterdam comedy institution! This popular English-language comedy show is a celebration of improvisation. 

They get suggestions from the audience and turn those ideas into scenes, characters and even songs. The shows are a mix of short form, long form and musical improvisation. Boom Chicago are among the world's best improvisers and this 75 minute show flies by.

Many famous comedians got their start at Boom Chicago including Seth Meyers, Jordan Peele, the creators and stars of Ted Lasso (Jason Sudeikis, Brendan Hunt and Joe Kelly), Ike Barinholtz, Amber Ruffin, and Kay Cannon. Best of all, the next generation is on stage tonight!

Now it's your turn to have a big night at Boom Chicago. Sit at tables with your friends while you enjoy a full bar with great drinks including (local) beers, fantastic wine and mixed cocktails. The Boom Chicago cast will do the rest!... More

title: Laughing Spree - English Comedy Show on a Boat
description:
Laughing Spree Comedy is Berlin's #1 (and only) English Comedy Show on a BOAT! 
It's a great night out in a friendly, warm atmosphere with lots of laughs. 6 Comedians share their stories and jokes with a fun crowd.
It's also a great place to meet new, cool people, connect and hang out after the show. ... More

title: National Comedy Center Admission
description: Secure your entry in advance to save time on vacation and explore the story of US comedy at Jamestown’s National Comedy Center. Head inside and enjoy the museum's immersive exhibits and experiences to learn how the nation's comedy developed, from vaudeville to viral memes. Stand in the shoes of pros, try stand-up, chart comic greats, and more; and upgrade to include admission to the nearby Lucille Ball Desi Arnaz Museum.... More

title: Friday & Saturday night comedy club entry
description: See some of the UK’s leading comedians live on stage at Blackpool’s Comedy Station—one of the most famous comedy venues in England. Each night, watch 4 comedians take to the stage and laugh with them (and at them) as they share awkward stories, jokes and take-downs. There are different acts on each night introduced by comedian and compere Ryan Gleeson—no two nights at the club are the same!... More

title: The Famous Boom Chicago Comedy Show in Amsterdam
description:
Boom Chicago is the best night out in Amsterdam! For 29 years, their comedy shows (in English) have been making locals and visitors laugh in their comedy temple with three theaters in the city center.

Boom hosts visiting comedians and stand up nights, but the main event is their own comedy shows. These are a fast-paced mix of sharp writing, quick improvisation, and live music created by their main stage cast. 

Many famous comedians got their start at Boom Chicago including Seth Meyers, Jordan Peele, Ike Barinholtz, Amber Ruffin, Kay Cannon the creators and stars of Ted Lasso (Jason Sudeikis, Brendan Hunt and Joe Kelly). Best of all, the next generation of comedy is onstage tonight!

Now it's your turn to enjoy a big night at Boom Chicago. Sit at tables with your friends while you order from a full bar with great drinks including interesting beers, fantastic wine from Grape District and delicious mixed cocktails. Soon it will be showtime. Get ready to laugh!... More

title: Comedy Night on The River Thames
description: Enjoy a night of comedy at one of London’s most unique comedy clubs — The Tattershall Castle, not a castle but in fact a boat docked on the edge of the River Thames. From the beer garden on the open-air top deck, see the Houses of Parliament, the London Eye and other iconic London sights. On board, see famous and up-and-coming comedians in an intimate space.... More

title: Branson Comedy Jamboree
description: Book your tickets for Branson, Missouri's comedy jamboree ahead of time to guarantee your admission. This popular evening activity often has sold-out days and times; but with tickets in hand, you'll be in for a night of family-friendly Ozarks fun. Get ready for dancing, singing, and comedy, packed into a 2-hour show.... More

title: The Late Show @ The Comedy Attic
description: This is a great choice for a fun-filled evening in Edinburgh. Visit a venue that has hosted some of the UK’s best comedians—The Comedy Attic. Being Edinburgh’s only late night comedy show can make The Late Show a popular choice, so guarantee your spot by pre-booking your entry in advance.... More

title: English Stand up Comedy Show
description:
English stand-up comedy in Tokyo's only stand-up comedy club! Learn about real Japan from Japanese and foreign comedians based in Tokyo, along with occasional visiting comedians. All in English!

This is a friendly show that could touch on anything from life in Japan to the survival strategies of sea cucumbers!
​​
We serve a variety of craft beers, mixed drinks, and snacks, 60 seconds from Shibuya Station.

The comedians will be different in every show, but all hilarious. Please note that this is a live comedy show where adult topics may come up and also a bar. Children under 18 must be accompanied by an adult.

Our Premium Show features top comedians delivering their best material.
Our Comedy Factory is a chaotic mix of old hands polishing new material and newbies trying out.
... More

title: The Great Comedy Magic Walk
description: Discover the historical highlights of Philadelphia’s Old City neighborhood—and enjoy a totally new way to see the sights—on this comedy- and magic-themed sightseeing tour. Pick from a range of convenient start times, meet your comedy magician guide at the Bourse Building, and set off on foot. In addition to seeing the area’s monuments and landmarks, you’ll enjoy an engaging and interactive magic show based on local history.... More

title: The Best in Stand Up Comedy - Comedy Shows every night of the week
description: Watch up-and-coming and established stand-up comedians perform at one of London’s most popular comedy clubs when you attend this evening showcase. Book your tickets before you travel to guarantee your admission—shows are held every night of the week—and make your own way to the central London venue. Enjoy a free drink if attending on a weeknight; then sit back, enjoy the show, and get ready to laugh and let loose.... More

title: Broadway Comedy Club
description: Since New York City is home to numerous top comedy clubs, travelers that want a great laugh shouldn't miss live stand-up comedy in the Big Apple. You can secure seats to the always popular Broadway Comedy Club with your advance purchase tickets, and avoid the disappointment of arriving for a sold out show. Just head to the venue for your performance, skip the pesky box office lines, sit down, and get ready to laugh.... More

title: Skip the Line: English-language Comedy Show Ticket at ROR Comedy Club
description: Laugh the night away in Osaka during this English-language comedy show at the ROR Comedy Club. Make your own way to the club and settle in with a drink before the show begins. Watch numerous comedy acts over the course of 90 minutes and have a chat with the performers after the show.... More
